trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around May 29th 2008
divs: sighting detailsi was sitting at my desk which is right by a window that faces west, in denver, colorado. something in the sky caught my eye because the sun reflected off of it. when i looked up, i initially thought it was a plane, but then i thought, "why would a plane be so low". at second glance, it didn't have any wings like a plane would. it was moving south bound, slowly across the sky. after about 10 seconds, it crossed over the top of the building i was in. i got up from my desk and ran to the other side of the building, opened the blinds and saw it again. this time it was going east. i passed a co-worker on my way to the other side of the building. she asked me what i was doing and i told her that i saw a ufo. she came to the window and saw the same object as me. the shape was like a cylinder\cigar laying on it's side. then, the tip\front of it was like a cone. it continued south east for a short period of time, then it climbed and continued to climb, then it shot off, out of site. the both of us saw it. i couldn't believe what i was seeing. it definately wasn't a plane. i was very surprised to see something like this. it was great.
